headline: Qualcomm downgraded as Apple split and licensing woes loom
summary: Investing.com - President Capital Management downgraded Qualcomm Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) stock, citing mounting challenges, including regulatory risks, Apple’s shift to self-developed 4G/5G modem chips, a slowdown in its licensing (QTL) business, and weakness in the AI PC segment.

headline: Warren Buffett Just Did This for the Third Quarter in a Row, and It's a Big Warning Sign for the Stock Market
summary: Warren Buffett is the undisputed greatest investor of all time, and his success at Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B), the conglomerate he has run for almost 60 years, has made thousands of investors rich alongside him.  It's no surprise that investors watch Buffett's every move for insight into the market, and it helps that the Oracle of Omaha has been happy to dole out advice during his long career of market-crushing returns.  Berkshire's portfolio fell from $280 billion to $266 billion in the quarter, and it's down from $352 billion at the end of 2023.

raw.headline: Warren Buffett Just Did This for the Third Quarter in a Row, and It's a Big Warning Sign for the Stock Market

It's no surprise that investors watch Buffett's every move for insight into the market, and it helps that the Oracle of Omaha has been happy to dole out advice during his long career of market-crushing returns.  Berkshire's portfolio fell from $280 billion to $266 billion in the quarter, and it's down from $352 billion at the end of 2023.

headline: Prediction: Nvidia Will Be the World's First $4 Trillion Company
summary: As measured by market capitalization, there has never been a company worth $4 trillion, but Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) is starting to close in.  At the time of this writing, Nvidia was worth around $3.6 trillion.  This is significant because second-place Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL), which needs to rise 16% in value to beat Nvidia to the mark, was the first company to cross the $1 trillion, $2 trillion, and $3 trillion market cap thresholds.

raw.headline: Prediction: Nvidia Will Be the World's First $4 Trillion Company
